chess.title: Pixel Chess
chess.description: A graphical Chess game designed and developed by a team of four as part of a semester long project. This application is written entirely in C++ and uses the SDL2 graphics library.

brick_breaker.title: Brick Breaker
brick_breaker.description: A classic arcade game inspired by Atari's Breakout built using Python and Pygame. The game's goal is to destroy all the bricks on the screen by repeatedly bouncing a ball off a paddle and into them.

reminders.title: Apple Reminders Clone
reminders.description: A web application emulating key features of iOS reminders built using React and Redux.

gomoku.title: Gomoku
gomoku.description: A Tic-Tac-Toe variant developed in Swift utilizing SwiftUI. The app is built with an MVVM architecture and includes an AI oppenent powered by a Minimax adversarial search algorithm. Thanks to Swift's protocol-oriented programming style, the app is highly modular.
